version_description: - Fixed an issue that recurring alarm is not working.

WEATHER
• Fixed location service errors pop-up bugs
• Fixed localization bugs
• Fixed an issue that app crash when selecting a specific location

ALARM
• Larger snooze button
• Added upcoming alarm indicator and snooze timer
• Selectable snooze time (5min -> 5min, 10min, 15min)

CLOCK
• Fixed an issue that clock hands is changed to wrong color
• Fixed some bugs
*** Known issues : There is a problem that is not installed the app. ***
• Fixed an crash issue with alarm sound #6
• Fixed an crash issue with alarm sound #6

- Fixed an issue with no visible weather information.
- Support for iOS 12 and iPhone XS Max/XR, iPad Pro 11-inch/12.9-inch

- Increased the size of the numbers in Clock.
- Fixed the Alarm Indicator
- Fixed the issue that weather condition icon is misplaced
- Changed from the battery bar to numeric in iPhone X/XS/XS max
- Changed from UV Index to Visibility in the infobar
- Shortening and stabilizing the weather update cycle
- UI and screen element optimization
- Add missing url scheme

- Added instructions for short alarms in alarm setting. ('Persistent' notification banner style recommended)
- Fixed a weather server issue in some location
- Fixed Home indicator to automatically hide
